name: TaskMate Mobile App
shortDescription: A comprehensive task management mobile application built with .NET MAUI for connecting customers with service workers.
fullDescription: TaskMate is a full-stack mobile application that bridges the gap between customers seeking services and workers offering their skills. The app features real-time task management, in-app messaging, offer negotiations, review systems, and seamless payment integration. Built with modern architecture patterns including MVVM, dependency injection, and RESTful APIs.
challenges: Implementing real-time notifications, managing complex state across multiple views, ensuring data synchronization between mobile and backend
solutions: Utilized MVVM pattern for clean separation of concerns, implemented efficient data caching strategies, and created robust API endpoints with proper error handling

name: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Angular 20 showcasing projects and professional experience.
fullDescription: Personal portfolio website designed with a mobile-first approach, featuring smooth animations, glassmorphism effects, and a modern gradient-based design system. The site includes project showcases, detailed about section, contact form integration, and downloadable resume functionality.
challenges: Creating a visually stunning yet performant interface, ensuring cross-browser compatibility, implementing smooth page transitions
solutions: Developed a comprehensive CSS design system with CSS custom properties, utilized Angular's latest features for optimal performance, and implemented lazy loading for better load times

name: E-Commerce Platform
shortDescription: A scalable e-commerce solution with shopping cart, payment processing, and inventory management.
fullDescription: Full-featured e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart functionality, order management, and integrated payment processing. Built with a focus on scalability, security, and user experience.
challenges: Handling secure payment processing, managing complex state for shopping cart, optimizing database queries for product catalog
solutions: Integrated Stripe for PCI-compliant payment processing, implemented Redux for predictable state management, created efficient MongoDB indexes for fast queries
